ampara di. es. senanayaka jathika pasale usas pela wibhaga madhyasthanayaka sisun dedenekuge sinhala uththara pathra kunu gode thibi soya gena atha.ema shalawe rajakari niyalunu shaladhipathiwaraya sathiyakata pasuwa wibhaga komasaris anura edirisinha mahathata ema uththara pathra ragena giyath eewa bhara ganima ohu wisin prathikshepa karini.me pilithuru pathra deka kagedayi methek anawaranaya nowu athara wibhaga prathipala nikuth wimath samangama eya ratata heliwi thibe.ee anuwa sinhala wishaya sandaha prathipala nolabu ee sisuwiyan dedena wanne ampara di. es. senanayaka jathika pasale kalani uththara saha thilini dilani samarakon sisuwiyoya.
esema den shiya oo pin nayakathwaya yatathe thawa thawath gowi janathawa maha nagara saha kuda nagarawala padinchi karawiya.

hitapu agawinisuruwaraya iwath kirima haraha nithiya nosalaka katayuthu kala sirisena mahatha parlimenthuwe sulutharaya himi ranil wikramasinha mahatha agamathi waraya lesa path karamin thawa duratath ema nithi wirodhi magema giya bawath janadhipathiwarana samaye menma in pasuwath janadhipathiwarayage sita pahalata sama denama pahe ithamath asangatha ekakata ekak nopahena pannaye amulika boru kima haraha yahapath prathirupayak goda naga gannata uthsaha ganna bawada ohu penwa dunneya.thama mahalekamwaraya lesa siti pakshayata drohi wemin wipakshaya samaga mathiwaranayata gos nawatha pamina widhayaka balaya yodagena thamanta erehiwa jandaya dun janathawage pakshaye nayakathwaya pahara ganima haraha maithripala sirisena mahathage prajathanthrawadaye swahawaya kelesadayi hondin penena bawada , melesa wyaja prathirupa mawima magin antha kairatikayan paramadarshin lesa osawa thabima anagatha parapura wetha ithamath naraka purwadarshayak sapayana bawada ohu penwa dunnaya.
